about_the_game:
Welcome to 【Feminization Device】! As a warrior princess affiliated with the association, you patrol the city day and night, defeating demonic creatures that are lurking or attacking.
Conquer the crimson-stained "Red Zones" and transform them into Green Zones to expand humanity's safe territories. Complete strategic missions such as rescue missions, extermination missions, purging missions, and special assault missions. Uncover the truth behind the demonic invasion, track the harsh fate of the battle maidens, and expose the presence of traitors.


【BattleSystem】
The game uses an over-the-shoulder shooting perspective, and players can switch between combat mode and movement mode by clicking the right mouse button.
In movement mode, use the arrow keys to move and press the spacebar to sprint. Sprinting consumes stamina.
On the map screen, players can move from their current region to an adjacent one. The buttons on the right display the adjacent regions, with colors indicating the threat level. The left-side buttons allow you to revisit your current region. The "City" button opens an overview of the entire map.

Once in an area, players can exit through the designated exit to return to the map screen and move to the next region. This process repeats, allowing for exploration across multiple regions.
In combat mode, holding down the left mouse button performs a charged attack.

- Characters with critical charge abilities can build up Critical Points while charging.
In combat mode, pressing the spacebar allows the player to dodge.

- If the player dodges just before an enemy attack (indicated by a flashing attack range) or a bullet hits, Bullet Time is activated.

- During Bullet Time, the player’s Critical Points and stamina are fully restored.
Melee characters automatically defend against enemy attacks in combat mode.

- However, they cannot defend while attacking.

- Defense consumes stamina. When stamina reaches zero, defense is unavailable.

- Defending restores a portion of Critical Points.
Shield Counter Melee characters automatically trigger shield counters when holding the left mouse button and getting hit.

- Shield counters consume a portion of stamina and deal massive shield counter damage.

【GameSystem】

Characters are divided into three types: melee, shooter, and special abilities. Each character has different charged attacks; some can set traps or barriers, while others can unleash high-damage long-range attacks.

The current area status is displayed in the top-right mini-map. The smartphone interface can only be opened in the green zone. The yellow number above the smartphone button represents money, and the orange number below represents fame. Inside the smartphone, you can change outfits and characters, open the warehouse, use the shop, apply for teammates, and check other mission information.

Entering the map screen, players can move from the current area to adjacent areas. The right column of buttons represents options for adjacent areas, and the enemy situation in each area is also indicated by color. The left buttons allow you to re-enter the original area. Pressing "City" displays the entire map.

Green Zone: A safe area confirmed to be free of enemies.

White Zone: An unknown area where demonic creatures are lurking, requiring cleanup.

Yellow Zone: A conflict area controlled by gangs or invaded by demonic creatures, possibly with security forces depending on the location.

Red Zone: Completely dominated by demonic creatures, with tentacle monsters continuing to invade adjacent areas.

The goal of the Battle Maiden Association is to completely eradicate all demonic creatures in the city. The game is won when all areas are green zones. Conversely, the game is lost when all areas become red zones.

Players need to eliminate all potential demonic creatures in this area.

Demonic creatures lurking in the area appear no different from ordinary citizens, but once attacked, they immediately reveal their true form and begin attacking the player.

Be careful not to accidentally harm ordinary citizens, as this may result in police intervention. If a player attacks civilians or police in the green zone, their fame will decrease.

content_descriptors.notes:
Nudity and Sexual Content:
This game contains explicit sexual content aimed at an adult audience. The specific themes included are:

Cross-Dressing: Characters depicted in cross-gender attire and roles, which is a significant aspect of the game's identity.
Undressing and Nudity: Scenes involving characters being undressed, which lead to situations of explicit nudity.
Non-Consensual Sexual Acts: Includes forced scenes that may involve rape or sexual coercion.
Forced Masturbation: Characters are depicted being compelled to masturbate, enhancing the game's intense scenarios.
Bondage and Suspension: Includes scenes where characters are restrained or suspended as part of the sexual content.
Whipping: Characters are subjected to whipping, depicted in a controlled, animated context.
Drugging: Characters are shown to be incapacitated via substances, leading to further non-consensual acts.
Oral Sex: Depictions of oral sexual acts are included as part of the game’s mature content narrative.
Gagging: Scenes involving characters' mouths being obstructed as part of the sexual scenarios.
Tentacle Monsters: Additional explicit content involving tentacle creatures engaging in non-consensual acts with characters.
Content Warning:
This game explores themes that might be considered extremely sensitive or disturbing to some audiences. All scenarios are fictional and are intended to provide a narrative experience within a fantasy context. All characters involved in mature content are depicted as over the age of 20.
Intended Audience:
This game is intended for adults only. Players should be aware of the game's mature and explicit nature before purchasing or playing.

name: Feminization Device

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to 【Feminization Device】!Players will control a Battle Maiden who belongs to the association, patrolling the city day and night to eliminate hidden or attacking demonic creatures.
